subject: Volleyball
lead_paragraph: Poland upset the three-time defending champion Brazil, 3-1, in the final of the men’s volleyball world championship in Katowice, Poland. The three-week tournament drew more than 500,000 fans.
snippet: Poland upset the three-time defending champion Brazil, 3-1, in the final of the men’s volleyball world championship in Katowice, Poland. The three-week tournament drew more than 500,000 fans.
